radiographic_examinations.findings: Small area of edema at the right cerebral hemisphere; ischemic area involving the territory of the right middle cerebral artery.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: 24 hours later, ischemic area involving the right middle cerebral artery became manifest.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Severely reduced blood flow in the right middle cerebral artery; large ischemic area in the corresponding territory; absence of flow in the distal internal carotid arteries; slight compensatory hypertrophy of the basilar artery.
Confirmed MR findings and showed narrowing of the left superficial femoral and popliteal arteries.
